docs.snippet: ON the way into New Delhi, Prime Minister Nehru jumped out of the Cadillac. He took the lathi stick from an overwhelmed policeman and tried to help clear a way for President Eisenhower through the wildly enthusiastic crowd.

docs.snippet: MONTREAL, Jan. 21 (Canadian Press) -- The International Air Transport Association announced today the introduction of a new economy class service between Europe and South America at substantially reduced fares.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Jan. 22 -- Francisco Juliao, leader of the growing movement of "peasant leagues" in economically depressed northeast Brazil, say he has reached agreement with Vice President Joao Goulart for creation or a Leftist bloc of peasants and...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Jan. 22 -- Francisco Juliao, leader of the growing movement of "peasant leagues" in economically depressed northeast Brazil, say he has reached agreement with Vice President Joao Goulart for creation or a Leftist bloc of peasants and workers.
docs.abstract: Socialist party chief F Juliao repts accord with Vice Pres Goulart for creation of Leftist bloc of peasants and Laborites; their meetings with Cuban Maj Guevara while in Moscow and Premier Castro support for peasants' 'struggle' linked; Goulart, just back from USSR, urges closer ties; pol power of Juliao discussed

headline.main: Brazilian Leftist Reports Plan For New Peasant-Worker Bloc; Leader in Impoverished Northeast Area Says Vice President Goulart Agrees to a Socialist-Laborite Merger
